Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: Whosoever is visited by a beggar for alms, impressed by his humility, the donor never turns him away disappointed.

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: Whosoever has a dog coming to his door after discarding all other alternatives, the master of the house out of clemency serves him with a morsel of food.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ਜਿਸ ਦੇ ਦੁਆਰੇ ਹੋਰਨਾਂ ਆਸਾਂ ਨੂੰ ਤ੍ਯਾਗ ਕੇ ਕੁੱਤਾ ਬੈਠ ਜਾਵੇ ਓੜਕ ਨੂੰ ਦਯਾ ਕਰ ਕੇ ਉਹ ਟੁਕੜਾ ਤੋੜ ਕੇ ਓਸ ਨੂੰ ਪਾ ਹੀ ਦਿਆ ਕਰਦਾ ਹੈ।

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: A shoe keeps lying unattended and uncared, but when its owner has to go out on some work, he too takes care of it then and uses it.
